segments.text: Tell me a little bit about yourself , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My name is Dunlin and I live in Beijing . I was born in 1980 . I will graduate from Peking University this July . I have majored in accounting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you tell me something about your family ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are three in my family , my parents and myself . My father is a teacher and my mother is a worker .
segments.speaker: S2
